ValidationRule.description: For PGi Credit rectype only as Request for Adjustment doesn't offer Credit Rebill as an adjustment type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", ISPICKVAL( Adjustment_Type__c ,"Credit Rebill"), ISBLANK( Credit_Rebill_Company_Name__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PGi_Credit_Request'
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Credit Rebill Company Name(s) is required for Credit Rebill requests.
